name: CfA Workers United (@cfaworkers@union.place)
summary:
We're excited to announce that we've reached an agreement with #CodeForAmerica on a severance package for all members who were laid off 2 weeks ago, including whose unit membership was in dispute!

https://statescoop.com/code-for-america-union-severance-layoffs/

This package more closely aligns with the TAs we had previously negotiated with management for layoffs and severance. This is a tremendous win for us and we couldn't have done it without our collective power and your support. âœŠ

#UnionStrong #Layoffs #HotLaborSummer
